name: The Chimes
description:
~The Chimes~

'The Chimes' is a simple yet impactful game, dedicated to just you and your Wind-chime.

The Chimes is a musical game, with 5 melodic notes in total, and was made for the May Day Mental Health Jam 2022.

It has been scientifically proven that playing music (and yes, composing too!)has positive effects regarding stress and mental health in general. Additionally, the game is set in empty space to reduce distractions and the tubes of the Wind-chime are intentionally made hover in the air as during panic attacks, some people find it helpful to imagine something floating in the air rhythmically to ease the breathing and get out of the panic attacks.

Controls:

D, F, G, H, J - keys for playing notes

Left mouse click drag - rotation of the Wind-chime

Feel free to compose your own music or play others music on the Wind-chime!
